info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 10:46PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Macon, central Transylvania, Jackson and southeastern Haywood Counties through 1130 PM EST... At 1045 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles north of Sylva to 4 miles east of Hayesville. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brevard, Franklin, Sylva, Waynesville, Cullowhee, Highlands, Balsam, Webster, Dillsboro and Cashiers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EST for northeastern Georgia...western North Carolina...and Upstate South Carolina.
